service.name: /ecmn105.em
service.query: SELECT CUST_ID FROM DCS.DM_CARD WHERE CARD_NO = DCS.SC_CRYPTO_FUN('ENC',?)
INSERT INTO DCS.DM_CUST_SSNO ( SS_NO, GRP_DATA01, GRP_DATA02, GRP_DATA03, REMARK, REG_DATE, REG_ID, MOD_DATE, MOD_ID) VALUES ( ?, '', '', '', '' , SYSDATE, ? , SYSDATE, ? )

SELECT CUST_NAME , ENTR_DT FROM DCS.DM_CUSTOMER WHERE 1=1 AND MOBILE_PH1 = DCS.SC_CRYPTO_FUN('ENC',?) AND MOBILE_PH2 = DCS.SC_CRYPTO_FUN('ENC',?) AND MOBILE_PH3 = DCS.SC_CRYPTO_FUN('ENC',?) AND CUST_STAT_FLAG <> '1'
SELECT DCS.F_CHK_CUST_SCED(?||?||?) CUST_NAME , ' ' ENTR_DT FROM DUAL
SELECT ROUND(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(10, 99),0)|| LPAD(ROUND(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(1, 99),0),2,0)|| LPAD(ROUND(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(1, 99),0),2,0) AS SMS_CD FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO SMST_T@SMS_ART ( S_SQL, -- 발송번호 S_ID, -- 발송자 ID S_DATE, -- 발송일자 S_TITLE, -- 발송 제목 S_BALGU, -- 발송구분(바로 발송이므로 1 고정) S_NAME, -- 수신자명 S_HP, -- 수신자번호 S_EXCGU, -- 엑셀입력구분(바로 발송이므로 0 고정) S_MEMO, -- 발송내용 S_SNAME, -- 발송명(공지용 문자 "ARTM"으로 고정) S_SSQL, -- 발송그룹번호 S_GU, -- 0 고정 S_SDATE, -- 예약일자(발송일자와 동일) S_STIME -- 예약시간(바로 발송이나, 발송시간확인을 위해 입력) ) VALUES ( EM_TRAN_MMS_SEQ.NEXTVAL@SMS_ART, 'DCS', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '멤버쉽인증문자', '1', ?, ?, '0', '[아트몰링] 맴버쉽가입 인증번호는 '||?||' 입니다.', 'ART_DCS', EM_TRAN_PR.NEXTVAL@SMS_ART, '0', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MI') )

INSERT INTO EM_TRAN_T@SMS_ART SELECT S_SQL, '', '', S_HP, '1800-5550' TRAN_CALLBACK, '1' TRAN_STATUS, SYSDATE TRAN_DATE, '','','','','', '','','', S_SQL TRAN_ETC4,'4' TRAN_TYPE FROM SMST_T@SMS_ART WHERE S_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND S_HP = ? AND S_NAME = ? AND S_MEMO LIKE '%'||?||'%'
